hooded cowl it is knit from the bottom up in one piece yarn combinations my suggestion is to use a wool yarn of sport weight held double together with a lace weight yarn or a wool yarn of worsted weight held together with a lace weight yarn i have used sport weight wool yarn held double together with mohair yarn amount approximately 120g 300m/100g sport weight together with 25g 210m/25g lace weight or 150g 130m/100g worsted weight together with 25g 210m/25g lace weight gauge and needles 15 sts x 19 row = 10x10 cm in stockinette stitch 6 mm circular needles 60 cm or preferred length you will also need one extra 6 mm needle whatever kind you have a slightly smaller/larger size will also work crochet hook tapestry needle stitch markers 2 © elida virack 2022 all rights reserved this
